Test Name: Exome Sequencing – Family Member Comparator Specimen
Specimen Type: Extracted DNA from a biological relative
Purpose: To analyze family member comparator DNA via exome sequencing for accurate and reliable genetic comparison with the proband.
Container: Sterile microcentrifuge tube (for extracted DNA stored at -20 °C)
Equipment: Next-Generation Sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina or Thermo Fisher), DNA extraction kit, library preparation kit, PCR thermocycler, spectrophotometer or Qubit fluorometer, bioanalyzer, calibrated pipettes, vortex mixer, centrifuge, bioinformatics analytical software
